mapper.select: SELECT i.name AS industry_name, n.name AS nature_name, s.scale AS company_scale FROM companies c LEFT JOIN t_industries i ON c.industry_id = i.id LEFT JOIN t_company_natures n ON c.nature_id = n.id LEFT JOIN t_company_scales s ON c.company_scale_id = s.id WHERE c.company_id = #{companyId} LIMIT 1
SELECT name FROM t_industries ORDER BY id ASC
SELECT name FROM t_company_natures ORDER BY id ASC
SELECT scale FROM t_company_scales ORDER BY id ASC
